org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.populator

Interface BigMushroom

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Populator

    public interface BigMushroom
extends Populator
    Represents a populator which places a number of large mushrooms. The type of mushroom to place can be set or can be randomized.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  BigMushroom.Builder
      A builder for constructing BigMushroom populators.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.Populator

        populate

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        Optional<BigMushroomType> getType()
        Gets the type of mushroom being placed by this populator. Note: this type will be ignored if the populator is set to randomize types usesRandomizedType(). If the populator is set to randomize then this method will return absent.
        Returns:
        The type, if not randomized

      • setType

        void setType(BigMushroomType type)
        Sets the type of mushroom to place. Setting the mushroom type will set usesRandomizedType() to false.
        Parameters:
        type - The new mushroom type

      • usesRandomizedType

        boolean usesRandomizedType()
        Gets whether this populator is randomizing which type it is placing. If set the mushroom type will be selected at random for each mushroom that it places.

        This defaults to true.

        Returns:
        True if this populator is using randomized mushroom types

      • useRandomizedTypes

        void useRandomizedTypes(boolean state)
        Sets whether this populator is randomizing which type it is placing. If set the mushroom type will be selected at random for each mushroom that it places.
        Parameters:
        state - The new state

      • getMushroomsPerChunk

        int getMushroomsPerChunk()
        Gets the number of mushrooms which will be attempted to be spawned.

        Note: This number is not a definite number and the final count of mushrooms which are successfully spawned by the populator will almost always be lower.

        The default value for this is 1 (from BiomeTypes.MUSHROOM_ISLAND.

        Returns:
        The number of mushrooms attempted to be spawned per chunk

      • setMushroomsPerChunk

        void setMushroomsPerChunk(int count)
        Sets the number of mushrooms which will be attempted to be spawned.

        Note: This number is not a definite number and the final count of mushrooms which are successfully spawned by the populator will almost always be lower.

        Parameters:
        count - The new amount to attempt to create
